title: Baby Carrier
description: two geometric embroidered panels in upper corners in pink, tan and grey on black; two elaborate embroidered floral designs in lower corners in bright green, pink, magenta, and grey on blue; long center panel with geometric embroidery in pink, tan and grey on blue surrounded by machine appliqued triangles in blue and grey; blue lining
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
